channel.title: Training Log on Quakkels.com
channel.description: Recent content in Training Log on Quakkels.com

item.title: 124: Bench, Db Bench, and Rows
item.description: Bench Playing around with a wider grip than I’m used to. Middle finger at the rings. 45x5 95x5 135x5 185x5 225x5 Db Bench 50x10,10,10,10,10 Chest Supported Db Row 50x10,10,10

item.title: 123: Squats, High Hex Deadlift
item.description: Squats Quick workout to reintroduce squats after many months off. 45x5 135x5 225x5 275x5 High Hex Deadlift 253x5,5,5

item.title: 122: Overhead Press, Push Press, Slam Ball
item.description: Overhead Press 45x5 95x5 135x5 155x5 165x3 170x1 Push Press 135x5,5,5 Conditioning 10 one handed wall slams (alternating.) 10 Overhead slams. Most rounds in 20 minutes. Completed 9 rounds in 20 minutes. Slam ball conditioning is turning into my favorite kind of conditioning.

item.title: 121: Overhead and Carry Conditioning
item.description: Overhead and Carry Conditioning 10 push presses with 135 pounds. 60 foot sandbag carry with 167 pounds. Repeat for 20 minutes. Completed 2 rounds with 135 for push press, then completed 3 rounds with 95 for push press, in 20 minutes Feeling flat and empty today.

item.title: 120: Pulldown and Dumbbell Clean & Press Conditioning
item.description: Pulldown and Dumbbell Clean & Press Conditioning 10 Seated Pulldowns with 90 pounds. 10 DB Clean and Presses with 40 pounds. Repeat for 20 minutes. Completed 9 rounds in 20 minutes.

item.title: 119: Farmer and Slam Ball Conditioning
item.description: Farmer and Slam Ball Conditioning 40 foot farmer carry with 135 per hand. 10 overhead slams with a 20 pound deadball. Completed 4 rounds in 10 minutes Using new farmer handles and a new 20 pound slam ball. This workout hit me harder than the previous two conditioning workouts. Originally wanted to go for 20 minutes, but my grip started failing and I started getting side cramps just 10 minutes in.

item.title: 118: Conditioning, Overhead and Carry
item.description: Conditioning 10 push presses with 135 pounds. 60 foot sandbag carry with 160 pounds. Repeat for 20 minutes. Completed 4 rounds (finished 4th sandbag run after buzzer) My endurance and cardio are really bad. These weights aren’t that heavy but I needed a lot of recovery time between rounds.

item.title: 117: Reboot 2
item.description: Bench 45x15 135x5 225x1 260x1 285x0 Carnival Dumbbell Row 87.5x6,6,6 Conditioning 10 Seated Pulldowns with 90 pounds. 10 DB Clean and Presses with 40 pounds. Repeat for 20 minutes. Completed 9 rounds

item.title: 116: Reboot 2
item.description: Conditioning Day Warmup Unracking, moving, and re-racking the dumbbell rack Unracking, moving, and re-racking the weight tree Moving sandbags to new home behind dumbbell rack and weight tree Sandbag Front Carry 160-ish pound bag for 60 foot runs. Ninety seconds rest between sets 160ish for 60ft x 7

item.title: 115: Reboot 2
item.description: Bench Goal for today is to set a new all-time 5RM personal record. 45x5 135x5 185x3 225x2 245x5 (PR!) 230x5,5 Your browser does not support the video tag. Pipe Dumbbell Row Set down and re-grip between each rep. 87.5x5,5,5,6

item.title: 114: Reboot 2
item.description: Bench Plan today: Tie an all-time 5RM PR. 45x5 135x5 185x3 210x2 235x5 (tied PR), 5, 4 (RPE 10) DB Row 80x11,11,11 High Hex Deadlift Goal: Set a PR. 253x3 343x3 433x3 (PR)

item.title: 113: Reboot 2
item.description: Bench 45x5 135x5 185x3 210x2 230x5,5,3 Band Pulldown Blue x 8,8,8

item.title: 112: Reboot 2
item.description: Crossfit style cardio 10 Seated Pulldowns with 90 pounds 10 DB Clean and Presses with 40 pounds Repeat for 20 minutes Finished 8 rounds.

item.title: 111: Reboot 2
item.description: Bench 135x5 185x3 205x3 225x5,5,5 Overhead Press 45x5 95x5 135x5,3,3 Hex Deadlift 253x3 343x4 383x4,4

item.title: 110: Reboot 2
item.description: Bench 135x5 185x3 205x2 225x5,5,3 (RPE 10) DB Row 80x10,10,10 Hex Deadlift 303x8

item.title: 109: Reboot 2
item.description: Bench 135x5,3 185x3 205x2 220x5,5,5 (Starting to get respectable again.) DB Row 80x8,8,8,8 Hex Deadlift 253x3 343x3 393x3,3 (Starting to get respectable again.)

item.title: 107: Reboot 2
item.description: Bench 45x7 135x5 185x5 215x5,5,5 DB Row 80x7,7,7,7 Hex Deadlift 253x3 303x3 363x3,3

item.title: 103: Reboot 2
item.description: Bench 45x5 135x5 185x5 210x5,5,5 DB Row 70x6,6,6,6 DB Seated Press 45x10

item.title: 101: Reboot 2
item.description: Bench Moved bench to the beginning of the workout so there’s less of a chance I’ll cramp up like I tend to do when bench comes after deadlifts. 45x12 135x5 185x5 215x3,3 (RPE 10) 205x4,3 Hex Deadlift 253x5 343x5,5,5

item.title: 100: Reboot 2
item.description: Hex Deadlift 73x1 163x8 253x8 303x8,8,8 Bench 45x10 135x5 185x3 215x3 (Cramped up) DB Row 60x8,12,10

item.title: 98: Reboot 2
item.description: Hex Deadlift 163x5 253x5 343x5,5,5 Bench 45x8 135x5 185x3 205x5,5

item.title: 98: Reboot
item.description: Paused Axle Squats 50x5 140x5 240x5,5,5 Axle Press 50x10 100x10 140x5,5,5 Axle Rows 140x8,8,8

item.title: 97: Reboot
item.description: Axle Press 50x10 100x10 110x10,10,10 Pin Overhead Press 100x5 120x5,5,5,5

item.title: 96: Reboot
item.description: Bench 45x1 95x5 135x5 155x3 210x5,5,5 Pendlay Row 95x5 135x5,8,8

item.title: 95: Reboot
item.description: Squat 45x5 135x5 225x5 275x5 305x5,2,5 (yikes) Overhead Press 45x7 95x5 135x3 162.5x4,3,3,3 (yikes) Seated Pulldown 90x5,5 135x3 162.5x5,5,5

item.title: 93: Reboot
item.description: Overhead Press 45x7 95x5 135x3 145x5,5,5 Seated Pulldown 45x10 90x5 135x3 160x5,5,5

item.title: 91: Reboot
item.description: Overhead Press 45x7 95x5 115x3 140x5,5,5 Seated Pulldown 45x10 90x7 145x5,5,5

item.title: 90: Reboot
item.description: Squat 45x5 135x5 225x3 265x5,5,5 (felt good) Bench 45x10 95x7 135x5 185x5,5,5 (felt good) Seated Pulldown 90x5 135x5,5,5

item.title: 89: Reboot
item.description: Overhead Press 45x7 95x5 115-5 140x5,5

item.title: 86: Reboot
item.description: Squat 45x5 135x5 235x5,5,5 Overhead Press 45x10 95x5 95x5 135x5,5,5 Deadlift 135x5,5 225x5 320x5

item.title: 84 PPL: Legs
item.description: Legs I’m out of the habit. Goals for the next few workouts is to just get in the gym and build up that daily/weekly routine again. I’m not going to even think about how far away my lifts are from my PRs. Just get into the gym and do work. 2x5, 1x5+ Squat (no belt, no sleeves) 45x5 135x5 225x5 275x5 275x5 275x0 3x10 Stiff Legged Deadlift 135x5 185x10 185x10 185x10 3x12 Homemade Belt Squat 45x5 75x12 75x24 (combined 2nd and 3rd sets) 75x 3x8-12 Leg Curls This PPL program calls for leg curls.

item.title: 83 PPL: Push A
item.description: Push A 4x5, 1x5+ Bench Press 45x7 95x5 135x3 185x1 200x5 200x5 200x5 200x5 200x5 (misgrooved 6th rep) 3x8 Overhead Press 135x7 (oof) 115x8 115x8 (hard) 3x10 Steep Incline Dumbbell Press 35x7 (oof) 30x10 30x10 3x10 Triceps Pushdowns SS 3x15 Lat Raises 30x10 | 15x15 (hard lat raise) 30x10 | 10x15 30x10 | 10x15 3x8 Overhead Tri Extends SS 3x15-20 Lat Raises 30x9 | 10x15 30x8 | 10x0 (shoulders are fried) 30x8 | 10x0

item.title: 82 PPL: Pull A
item.description: Pull A 1x5+ Deadlifts 135x5 225x5 315x5 355x5 (felt weak) 3x10 Pulldowns 110x10 110x10 110x10 (hard) 3x10 Seated Cable Rows 110x10 110x10 110x10 5x20 Face Pulls 20x15 20x15 20x15 20x15 20x15 4x12 Hammer Curls 20x12 20x12 20x12 20x12 4x10 Dumbbell Curls 20x10 20x10 20x10 20x10

item.title: 81 Workout
item.description: Upper Day Bench 45x8 95x8 135x8 185x6 205x5 215x3 Steep Incline DB Press 40x10 45x8 45x8 45x8 45x8 DB Rows 60x8 60x8 60x8 60x8 60x8 DB Curls 20x40

item.title: 80 Basic Strongman: W4D1, CG Incline Paused Bench and Axle Strict Press
item.description: Upper Day CG Incline Paused Bench Work up to a 2RM over seven sets. Warmup 45x10 95x5 Work 135x2 145x2 155x2 165x2 175x2 185x2 195x2 max effort 205x0 (did not attempt) Axle Strict Press Using mix grip, continental first rep. Work up to a 3RM over four sets. 145x3 160x3 170x3 175x3 Lat Pulldown Ten by ten with 110 pounds. 110x10 110x10 110x10 110x10 110x10 110x 110x 110x 110x 110x Couldn’t finish.

item.title: 79 Basic Strongman: W3D3, Yoke and Sandbag Loads
item.description: Event Day Yoke Run I’m supposed to work up to 70% from last time, but that was a bad workout for me. So I’m going to guess at a reasonable number and work up to 345lbs. 175x50’ 265x50’ 315x50’ 345x50’ 345x50’ 345x50’ By the last run that 345 felt just about right. Sandbag Load Use the same sandbag as last time. Two loads for a five minute EMOM.

item.title: 78 Basic Strongman: W3D2, Paused Squats and Deadlifts
item.description: Lower Day I’m trying two new things this workout. One, I’m eating two pieces of toast with honey. The first before the workout starts, and the second after squats are done. Two, I’m using knee sleeves for the first time today. My squat PR is 420 pounds without sleeves, so I think I’m strong enough that I can justify using them. Also, they’ll be useful for more knee stability during moving events like sled, farmers, and yoke.

item.title: 77 Basic Strongman: W3D1, CG Paused Bench and Strict Press
item.description: Upper Day CG Paused Bench Work up to a 2RM over seven sets. Warmup 45x10 95x5 Work 155x2 165x2 175x2 185x2 195x2 205x2 215x2 Strict Press Work up to a 3RM over four sets. 135x3 155x3 160x3 felt good 165x 170x3 170 for three reps is not a PR but it’s been a while since I’ve trained strict barbell overhead press. I probably could’ve gone 5 pounds heavier which would’ve tied my last 3RM.

item.title: 76 Basic Strongman: W2D3, Farmers and Sled
item.description: Event Day Farmers Run Four laps with light weight. Two laps with medium weight. Then one lap with heavy weight. After the last lap hold the handles for max time. 120 pounds a hand for 4 laps 170 pounds a hand for 2 laps (very hard) 190 pounds a hand for 1 laps (held for 6 breaths) Sled Yoke Backwards Drag 400 pounds 50 feet 5 minute EMOM Yoke Push 400 pounds 50 feet 5 minute EMOM Ate one piece of toast with honey before farmers, and another piece of toast with honey before sled.

item.title: 75 Basic Strongman: W2D2
item.description: Lower Day Paused SSB Squat Work up to a 3RM over seven sets. Warmup 60x5 150x5 Work 240x3 260x3 280x3 290x3 300x3 305x3 315x3 Hex Bar Deadlifts (High Handles) Work up to a 5RM over five sets. 160x5 250x5 340x5 390x3 Ran out of gas at the end. I think I might want to start eating something small during the workout.

item.title: 74 Basic Strongman: W2D1
item.description: Upper Day CG Incline Paused Bench Work up to a 3RM over seven sets. Warmup 45x10 95x5 Work 135x3 155x3 165x3 175x3 185x3 (hard) 195x 190x2 (oof) 205x 175x3 Axle Strict Press Using mix grip, clean first rep. Work up to a 5RM over four sets. 140x5 145x5 150x5 (hard) 155x5 Weirdly easier than 150lbs. Seated Cable Row Ten by ten with 135 pounds.

item.title: 73 Basic Strongman: W1D3 (b)
item.description: Sandbag Day Sandbag Loads 5 light loads warmup 10 minute EMOM with 160lb bag Sandbag Carry 160lbs for one minute

item.title: 72 Basic Strongman: W1D3 (a)
item.description: Yoke Day Yoke Work up to a top run of 50’ over five sets. Nothing crazy heavy. Should slow me down. Should not get me staggering. Yoke runs were essentially superset with light power stairs and duck walk. Between runs I keep having to grab more plates from the basement and take them outside. 175x50’ 265x50’ 355x50’ 405x50’ 455x20ish’ I’m surprised that I didn’t get 455 pounds for the full fifty feet.

item.title: 71 Basic Strongman: W1D2
item.description: Lower Day Paused Squat Work up to 3RM over seven sets. Pause. Warmup 95x5 135x5 Work 185x3 225x3 275x3 315x3 335x3 345x2 350x Paused Deadlift Work up to a 5RM over five sets. Pause twice (on the ascent and the descent). 135x5 225x5 275x4 Geez! This is harder than I thought it would be. 275x Torso cramped up right before the 4th set. Had to call it a day.

item.title: 70: W1D1
item.description: Upper Day CG Paused Bench Work up to a 3rm over seven sets. Warmup 45x10 95x5 Work 135x5 (oops) 165x3 185x3 195x3 200x3 205x3 210x3 PR Strict Press With a barbell. Out of a rack. Work up to a 5rm over four sets. 135x5 155x5 160x4 (failed fifth rep) 150x5 The 160 pounds for four is 15 pounds less then my best five rep PR.

item.title: 69: Miscellaneous Pulling
item.description: Deadlift Day Deadlift I haven’t done a standard deadlift in 3 months. So going to work up to a max single and see what I can handle. Warmup 135x5x2 Work 225x1 315x1 405x1 440x1 465x1 +10 pound PR!!! Your browser does not support the video tag. Cable Pulldown Going for 90x10x10 for weight/reps/sets. Try and match or beat session from 61B 90x10 90x10 90x10 90x10 90x10 90x10 90x10 90x10 90x10 90x10

item.title: 68: Miscellaneous Pressing
item.description: Overhead Press (strict) 45x5 95x5 135x1 165x1 185x1 200x0 Z Dumbbell Press 20x10 30x10 40x10 45x10 50x7 45x8 40x10 35x6 (lolwut?) 30x8 25x9

item.title: 67 Basic Strongman: Week 12 Day 3
item.description: Farmers and Sandbag Day Farmers Walk Work up to a new max. 100x1 100x1 150x1 190x1 220x1 +20 pound PR AND competition weight!!! Your browser does not support the video tag. This was a great farmers session. That final set was a PR by 20 pounds, and it was competition weight. Sandbag Load Work up to my heaviest sandbag. If I can get one rep with it then get a couple more.

item.title: 66 Basic Strongman: Week 12 Day 2
item.description: Lower Day Front Squat Work up to a 1RM over seven sets. No pause. 45x5 135x5 185x3 225x1 275x1 315x1 325x1 +5 pound PR I misloaded the bar. Wanted to attempt 335 but ended up attempting 325. Still a PR though. Your browser does not support the video tag. 18” Deadlift Work up to a 1RM over 5 sets. 225x1 315x1 405x1 475x1 500x1 +5 pound PR!

item.title: 65 Basic Strongman: Week 12 Day 1
item.description: Upper Day Close Grip Incline Work up to a 1RM over seven. No pause on chest. Warmup 45x10 95x5 Workout 135x1 155x1 175x1 195x1 205x1 215x1 +5 pound PR 225x0 overreach Your browser does not support the video tag. Axle Push Press Work up to a 1RM over 7 sets. 100x1 140x1 160x1 180x1 200x1 220x1 +10 pound PR 240x0 Previous set was difficult. So I decided to skip this attempt.

item.title: 64 Basic Strongman: Week 11 Day 3
item.description: Yoke and Sled Day Day 3 is such a mess. I tried sticking with the spirit of day 3 (moving and strongman events) but I did not have the correct mindset from the beginning and I’ve tweaked it so much that it hardly looks like what the program has written. Since there are only two more “day threes” left, I’m just going to continue trying to stay with the spirit of day 3 rather than doing the workouts exactly as written.

item.title: 63 Basic Strongman: Week 11 Day 2
item.description: Lower Day Squats Work up to 1RM over seven sets with no pause in the hole. Warmup 45x10 95x5 Work 135x3 225x1 315x1 365x1 385x1 405x1 420x1 +10 pound PR Your browser does not support the video tag. 2” Deficit Deadlift Work up to 1RM over seven sets. 135x3 225x1 315x1 365x1 395x1 425x1 +20 pound PR 440x did not attempt Your browser does not support the video tag.

item.title: 62 Basic Strongman: Week 11 Day 1
item.description: Upper Day Close Grip Bench Work up to a 1RM over seven sets. No Pause. Warmup 45x10 95x5 Work 135x1 185x1 225x1 235x1 245x1 255x1 PR 265x0 (oh well) Log Push Press Work up to a 1RM over seven sets. Seven sets is new. I don’t recall so many sets for log on previous weeks. 100x1 130x1 150x1 170x1 190x1 200x0 (I was lightheaded and confused after the 190.

item.title: 61B Basic Strongman: Week 10 Day 3
item.description: Sandbag Makeup Day Sandbag Loading From week 7 day 3: One light set of five loads. Then 5 minute EMOM with heavy stone. 235x0 (Crap) New Plan 160x1 160x1 160x1 160x1 160x1 160x1 160x1 160x1 I’m not going to dwell on this workout too much. Day 3 has been a mess for me for a few weeks. And there’s lots of stress outside the gym. Going to just move on and work hard next time.

item.title: 61 Basic Strongman: Week 10 Day 3
item.description: Farmers and Sandbag Day Farmers Due to limited space in my basement and and unwillingness to lug hundreds of pounds of weight up and down my basement stairs every week, I’ll be doing 4 runs of 40 feet (with a turn) instead of 4 runs of 100 feet. Work up to a max over 4 sets. No drops allowed. 100/hand x 1 150x1 180x1 210x1 +10 pound PR Doggonit my hands hurt after that.

item.title: 60 Basic Strongman: Week 10 Day 2
item.description: Lower Day Front Squat Work up to a 2RM over seven sets. No pause. Warmup 95x10 135x5 Work 185x2 225x2 250x2 275x2 300x2 310x2 PR 320x2 PR again 18” Deadlift Work up to a 3RM over five sets. 225x3 315x3 405x3 455x2 475x0 My 18” deadlift was really disappointing today. But, the magical PRs were due to stop. I was probably overreaching anyway. Still got front squat PRs though.

item.title: 59 Basic Strongman: Week 10 Day 1
item.description: Upper Day Close Grip Incline Bench Work up to a 2RM over seven sets. Warmup 45x10 95x5 Work 135x2 155x2 175x2 185x2 195x2 205x2 +5lb PR 215x2 eh, PR* with an asterisk. *Butt lifted off the bench a bit on the second rep. Probably should’ve attempted 210 pounds instead. This is getting logged as a PR with 205lbs. Axle Push Press Work up to a 3RM over four sets.

item.title: 58 Basic Strongman: Week 9 Day 3
item.description: Yoke Walk and Yoke Push Day The weather is getting warmer. I have a yoke. I’m going to start doing yoke like Mike Westerling prescribes. Since I haven’t been doing yoke at all yet, I’m starting with week 1 day 3’s yoke. Yoke Progressively heavier runs of 50ft over five sets. Work up to a challenging weight that’s still manageable. Heavy enough to slow me, but not heavy enough to barely be able to walk.

item.title: 57 Basic Strongman: Week 9 Day 2
item.description: Lower Day Squats No pause. Work up to 2RM over seven sets. Warmup 45x10 135x5 Work 225x2 275x2 315x2 350x2 375x2 385x2 easy PR! 395 400x2 +20lb PR Since 385lbs for 2 felt so easy I decided to go heavier than I planned on my last set. This program is voodoo. I don’t understand why it works so well. I don’t feel beat up at all for being this deep into a program.

item.title: 56 Basic Strongman: Week 9 Day 1
item.description: Upper Day Close Grip Bench No pause. Work up to 2RM over seven sets. Warmup 45x10 95x5 Work 135x2 185x2 210x2 220x2 230x2 240x2 250x2 +10lb PR My close grip bench rep PRs are all more than my regular bench PRs. Looking forward to eventually testing my regular bench. CG Paused Bench and CG Bench both seem to have been a been huge help. Log Push Press Clean first rep.

item.title: 55 Basic Strongman: Week 8 Day 3
item.description: Farmers and Sandbag Load Sled Drag Day I haven’t been rotating day 3 like the Basic Strongman program prescribes. The last two weeks I’ve been a little burned out on this day, so I’ve skipped them. I think not rotating was a mistake. I bet the variety would have helped to avoid the mental burnout. So, week 8 day 3 has farmers and tire flips prescribed. I don’t have a tire, but I do have a little DIY sled drag thingy I can rig up.

item.title: 54 Basic Strongman: Week 8 Day 2
item.description: Lower Day Front Squats Work up to a 3RM over seven sets. No pause. Warmup 45x10 95x5 Work 135x3 185x3 225x3 245x3 265x3 285x3 PR! Felt too easy 300x3 +25lb PR 18” Deadlift Work up to a 5RM over five sets. 135x5 225x5 315x5 405x5 445x5 +20lb PR These PRs are really exciting. I’m not sure how they happened. I don’t physically feel super run-down like I usually do when getting PRs.

item.title: 53 Basic Strongman: Week 8 Day 1
item.description: Upper Day Close Grip Incline Bench Work up to 3RM over seven sets. No pause. Warmup 45x10 95x5 Work 135x3 150x3 165x3 175x3 185x3 195x3 200x3 +5 pound PR Seated Cable Rows Full body “cheat” rows. 45x10 90x10 135x10 180x10 225x8 These got really cheaty at the end. Touched the grip to my core everytime, but toward the end it was more of a hip hinge than a cable row.

item.title: 52 Basic Strongman: Week 7 Day 2
item.description: Lower Day Squats No pause. Work up to 3RM over seven sets. Warmup 45x10 135x5 Work 225x3 275x3 315x3 345x3 365x3 375x3 380x3 +25 pound PR Very happy with squats today. This PR was great. 2” Deficit Deadlifts Work up to a 5RM over 5 sets. 135x5 225x5 315x5 365x3 this was not a good set 365x5 +50lb PR Repeated the 365 for my last set since set 4 was so disastrous.

item.title: 51 Basic Strongman: Week 7 Day 1
item.description: Upper Day Close Grip Bench No pause. Work up to 3RM over seven sets. Warmup 45x10 95x5 Work 135x3 185x3 205x3 215x3 225x3 235x3 240x3 PR One Arm Seated Cable Rows Alternate arms. 45x6 90x6 110x6 120x6 130x6 Log Push Press Clean first rep. Work up to 5RM over four sets. 100x5 150x5 175x5 185x5 PR Push pressing feels so good after 6 weeks of strict pressing.

item.title: 50 Basic Strongman: Week 6 Day 2
item.description: Lower Day I haven’t worked out for the last few days. So, this week will only have 2 workouts. Today was my lower day, rather than events. I’m not too worried about it because I haven’t been rotating Farmers and Sandbag the last few weeks. Paused Front Squats Work up to a 1RM over seven sets. Pause in hole for one second. Warmup 45x10 95x5 Work 135x1 185x1 225x1 245x1 265x1 295x1 315x1 PR Your browser does not support the video tag.

item.title: 49 Basic Strongman: Week 6 Day 1
item.description: Upper Day Inclined Paused Close Grip Bench Work up to a 1RM over seven sets. Pause one second at the bottom. Warmup 45x10 95x5 Work 135x1 155x1 165x1 175x1 190x1 200x1 215x0 Failed the rep 210x1 PR I was pretty certain I had that 215 pounds in me. But it stalled right at my forehead. I decided to backoff and go for 210. I got that and it’s still a PR by 5 pounds.

item.title: 48 Basic Strongman: Week 5 Day 3
item.description: Sandbag and Farmers Day Farmers Walk Lap is 40ft with turn then a drop. Final set finish with hold ALAP. 100x4 160x2 200x1, held for 8 breaths PR The hold for as long as possible after the last set is great for mindset. Knowing I could have carried it farther carries positivity over to the next workout. Sandbag Load Max loads in one minute. Warmup 5x85 Work 235x1 PR So this isn’t exactly what Mike’s program calls for, but I decided it would be fun to change it up.

item.title: 47 Basic Strongman: Week 5 Day 2
item.description: Lower Day Squats Pause at the bottom for one second. Work up to a 1RM over seven sets. Warmup 135x10 185x5 Work 225x1 275x1 315x1 345x1 365x1 375x1 385x1 385lbs for one is certainly a paused PR. But, I think I could have gone heavier. It was right around 9 or 9.5 RPE. Given my recent track record of failing top sets it’s probably better that I didn’t make a heavier attempt.

item.title: 46 Basic Strongman: Week 5 Day 1
item.description: Upper Day Close Grip Bench Press Work up to 1RM over seven sets. Pause at the bottom for one second. 45x10 95x5 185x1 195x1 205x1 215x1 225x1 235x1 245x1 (Pretty sure this is a PR) 245x1 definitely felt like a true 1RM. I changed my approach to these seven sets compared to last time. The warmups that I had been including are now separate sets so that the seven can be closer jumps.

item.title: 45 Basic Strongman: Week 4 Day 3
item.description: Farmers and Sandbag Load Day Farmers Walk Lap is 40ft with turn then a drop. Final set finish with hold ALAP. 100x4 (lowered starting wait compared to last time.) 160x2 195x1 PR Sandbag Load This was planned to be a seated row day. But, since last week’s sandbag went so poorly I decided to revisit the sandbag today. Warmup 85x5 5 Minute EMOM 206x2 PR 206x2 206x1 (gassed out.

item.title: 44 Basic Strongman: Week 4 Day 2
item.description: Lower Day Front Squats Work up to a 2RM over seven sets. I was also supposed to pause these for 1 second. I didn’t. I forgot about until just now. 45x10 135x5 195x2 235x2 255x2 275x2 285x2 (PR) 18” Deadlift Work up to a 3RM over 5 sets. 135x3 225x3 315x3 405x3 445x3 (PR)

item.title: 43 Basic Strongman: Week 4 Day 1
item.description: Upper Day Paused Close Grip Incline Bench Pause at bottom for one second. Work up to a 2RM over seven sets. 45x10 95x5 135x3 175x2 195x2 200x2 205x1 (Missed second rep) Axle Strict Press Clean first rep. Work up to a 3RM over 4 sets. 140x3 155x3 165x3 180x2 (Missed final rep) Need to do a better job of selecting top sets. Would preffer to have all reps succeed than to reach and miss.

item.title: 42 Basic Strongman: Week 3 Day 3
item.description: Farmers and Sandbag Load Day Farmer Walks Lap is 40ft with turn then a drop. Final set finish with hold ALAP. 120lbs/hand for 4 laps. 160lbs/hand for 2 laps. 190lbs/hand for 1 lap. Held for 6 breathes. Sandbag Loading I wanted to use my new 100KG Cerberus Sandbag V2 for this workout. The sandbag I used last time was only 167lbs. I filled the new sandbag to 206lbs. Was supposed to load the sandbag over bar two times every minute on the minute for five minutes, but since I was using a heavier sandbag than last time, I decided for one load EMOM instead of two.

item.title: 41 Basic Strongman: Week 3 Day 2
item.description: Lower Day Squats Work up to a 2RM over seven sets. One second pause at the bottom. 135x10 185x5 225x2 275x2 315x2 345x2 365x2 This might’ve been an RPE8.5. 2” Deficit Deadlift Decided not to do touch’n’go reps this week because I use bumpers and deficit deads are a pretty new movement pattern for me. Work up to a 3RM over 5 sets. 135x3 225x3 315x3 365x3 375x3 Felt like a REP9.

item.title: 40 Basic Strongman: Week 3 Day 1
item.description: Pressing Day Close Grip Paused Bench Work up to a 2RM over 7 sets. Pause each rep for one second at bottom. 45x10 95x5 135x3 185x2 205x2 220x2 235x2 Log Strict Press Work up to 3RM over 4 sets. 100x3 125x3 150x3 170x3

item.title: 39 Basic Strongman: Week 2 Day 3
item.description: Farmers and Cable Rows Day Farmer Walks Lap is 40ft with turn then a drop. Final set finish with hold ALAP. 110lbs/hand for 4 laps. 150lbs/hand for 2 laps. 185lbs/hand for 1 lap. Held for 4 breathes. Seated One Arm Rows Alternating arms 45x5 90x5 105x5 110x5 115x5 These seated rows felt great. I should’ve made this pulley system a lot sooner.

item.title: 38 Basic Strongman: Week 2 Day 2
item.description: Lower Day Front Squats Work up to a 3RM over seven sets. Pause one second in the hole. 45x10 135x5 185x3 225x3 245x3 255x3 275x3 PR!!! 18” Deadlift 135x5 225x5 315x5 405x5 425x5 PR!!!

item.title: 37 Basic Strongman: Week 2 Day 1
item.description: Pressing Day Close Grip Incline Bench One second pause. Work up to a 3RM over seven sets. 45x10 95x5 135x3 165x3 185x3 195x3 (This was an incline PR) 200x0 (skipped this set) Axle Push Press Continental clean first rep. Work up to 5RM over four sets. 100x5 (This was an “extra” set to get used to push pressing and continental cleaning) 140x5 155x5 170x5 180x5 It’s been over a week since I’ve done any rows.

item.title: 36 Basic Strongman
item.description: Farmers and Sandbag Day Farmer Walks Lap is 40 feet with a turn at one end and a drop/re-pick at the other. Final set hold for as long as possible. 100lbs/hand for 4 laps 140lbs/hand for 2 laps 175lbs/hand for 1 lap. Held for 7 breaths. I should be able to go heavier next time since I held them for so long on the last lap. Sandbag Load Load over 52” high bar.

item.title: 35 (Basic Strongman)
item.description: Lower Day Squats Pause for one second. Work up to 3RM over seven sets. 135x10 185x5 225x3 275x3 315x3 335x3 345x3 Felt like I perhaps could’ve gone heavier, but didn’t want to get too ambitious. This is a PR anyway since I’ve never really tried paused squats before. 2” Deficit Deadlift Touch’n’go. Work up to a 5RM over five sets. 135x5 225x5 275x5 315x5 Skipped final set. Previous set felt like a max.

item.title: 34 (Basic Strongman)
item.description: Pressing Day Close Grip Paused Bench Work up to three rep max over seven sets 45x10 95x5 135x3 165x3 185x3 205x3 215x3 Log Strict Press Work up to five rep max over four sets. Clean first rep. 100x5 120x5 140x5 160x3 (failed fourth rep) 150x3 (work to make up for missed reps) I’m following the Basic Strongman program from the e-book Built By Mike by Mike Westerling.

item.title: 33 (No Plan)
item.description: No Plan Day Since I’m certainly going to change my program starting next week, I decide to stray from the HLM template that I’ve been following. Today I focused on Farmer Walks and Cable rows. I spent some time rigging up a couple of pulleys to add to my Spud Inc pulley. So now I have a pulldown that is straight vertical, and I can rig it so I have a seated cable row as well.

item.title: 32 (HLM)
item.description: Heavy Day Squats are increasing slowly. Overhead press is increasing slowly. But deadlifts have regressed. I think one heavy set a week and one workout of SLDL 3x5 a week isn’t working. I’m not sure if doing heavy squats in the same workout as heavy deadlifts is too taxing. I might decide to go back a to 4 day split next week. Squats 45x5 135x5 225x5 315x3 330x1 340 for 3 sets of 5 Overhead Press 45x5 95x5 135x3 155x1 162.

item.title: 31 (HLM)
item.description: Medium Day Squats 45x5 135x5 225x5 275x3 295x1 310lbs for 3 sets of 5 Overhead Press 45x5 95x5 135x3 145x1 152.5 lbs for 3 sets of 5 SLDL 205x3 225x5 275x3 285 lbs for 3 sets of 5 Featured Music Best deadlifting (and SLDL) music. “Give me all you have! Pull as hard as you can!”

item.title: 30 (HLM)
item.description: Light Day SSB Squats 45x5 135x5 245x5 275x3 290x1 300lbs for 3 sets of 5 Bench 45x5 135x5 185x3 205x1 215x1 225x5 225x3 185 for 3 sets of 5 Bench didn’t go well today. Maybe this is too heavy for a “light” day. Pendlay Row 135x5 185x3 185x1 205 for 3 sets of 5

item.title: 29 (HLM)
item.description: Heavy Day Skipped over the medium day and went straight to heavy. Redoing the squat session from my last heavy workout to get all 3x5 at 335lbs. Squats 45x5 135x5 225x5 315x3 335 for 3 sets of 5 Overhead Press 45x5 95x5 135x3 155x1 162.5lbs for 5 sets of 3 My arms felt dead today. I could only manage 3 reps in the first set. So I switched to 5x3 instead of 3x5.

item.title: 28 (HLM)
item.description: Light Day SSB Squats 65x5 155x5 245x3 285x1 295 for 3 sets of 5 Bench 45x5 135x5 185x3 215x1 225 for 3 sets of 5 185 for 2 sets of 8 Pendlay Row 135x8 185x4 205x8 205x6 205x6 Rows did not feel good. Need to work those more.

item.title: 27 (HLM)
item.description: Heavy Day I didn’t train much during December. So this workout is a measure of how much I’ve regressed. Squats 45x5 135x5 225x5 315x5 335x5 335x5 335x4 Only had 4 reps in my last set. But I’m pleased I was able to do this with 335. Overhead Press 45x5 95x5 135x3 145x1 155x1 160 for 3 sets of 5 Very pleased that I was able to get these reps with 160 pounds.

item.title: 26 (HLM)
item.description: Light Day SSB Squats 65x5 155x5 245x3 275x1 285lbs for 3 sets of 5 Close Grip Bench 45x5 95x5 135x5 185x3 205x1 215lbs for 5 sets of 5 The shoulder is just about back to normal. Close grip bench with elbows tucked helped stability a lot. Pendlay Row 135x3 185x3 205lbs for 3 sets of 8

item.title: 25 (HLM)
item.description: Heavy Day Weights felt good today. Feels like I’ve accidentally timed my first workout back after Thanksgiving so that everything felt great. Also, my shoulder didn’t bother me at all today. It’ll be tested in a couple days with bench. Squats 45x5 135x5 225x3 315x3 335x1 345lbs for 3 sets of 5 Overhead Press 45x5 95x5 135x3 150x1 160lbs for 3 sets of 5 Deadlift 225x5 315x3 365x1 405lbs for 1 set of 5

item.title: 24 (HLM)
item.description: Medium Day Squats 45x5 135x5 225x5 275x3 295x1 315 for 3 sets of 5 Overhead Press 45x5 95x5 135x3 145 for 3 sets of 5 Thankfully OHP doesn’t affect my shoulder as much as bench. SLDL 135x5 225x3 275 for 3 sets of 5

item.title: 23 (HLM)
item.description: Light Day Squats 65x5 155x5 245x3 275 for 3 sets of 5 CG Paused Bench 45x5 95x5 135x5 155x3 185 for 5 sets of 5 Shoulder still bothering me. The higher reps, closer grip, and pause made me feel like I was working at least a little bit. Didn’t want to go any heavier because I could definitely ‘feel’ the weight on my shoulder. Pendlay Row 135x5 185x3 200 for 3 sets of 8

item.title: 22 (HLM)
item.description: Today I started a new approach with Heavy/Light/Medium (HLM.) Heavy Day Squats 45x5 135x5 225x5 315x3 325x1 340lbs for 3 sets of 5 Squats were prescribed to be 5x5, but I changed it once the workout was underway because it was taking so long, and it felt heavy. Overhead Press 45x5 95x5 135x3 155x1 157.5lbs for 3 sets of 5 Press was prescribed for 5x5. Decided to change it to 3x5 just like squat.

item.title: 21 (Persistence)
item.description: Bench Day Superset 1 Lift LBs Sets Reps Bench 240 2 3 Pendlay Row 240 2 3 I failed the first rep of my third set. And my left shoulder felt tweaked. Decided to call it a day and not push it.

item.title: 20: R/Strongman Challenge (Persistence)
item.description: R/Strongman Challenge Day (Usually deadlift day) Got an 18” Deadlift gym PR with a lift of 495lbs. Your browser does not support the video tag. Superset Lift LBs Sets Reps SSB Squat 305 4 3 DB Step Up 50 4 6

item.title: 19 (Persistence)
item.description: Overhead Press Day Superset 1 Lift LBs Sets Reps Overhead Press 175 5 3, 3, 3, 2, 3 Lat Pulldown 175 5 6 OHP will be kept at 175 until I can complete all 5 sets of 3 reps. Superset 2 Lift LBs Sets Reps DB Floor Flies 40 4 6 DB Seated Press 50 4 10, 10, 10, 7 Will keep DB Seated Press at 50 until I can complete all 4 sets of 10.

item.title: 18 (Persistence)
item.description: Deadlift Day Superset 1 Lift LBs Sets Reps Squat 345 5 3 Ab Roller bw 5 10 Instead of doing my usual 18” deadlift superset I opted to attempt an entry into r/strongman’s 18” deadlift challenge. Unfortunately, I failed with 495lbs. It broke off the blocks, but I just couldn’t get it past my knees. Might attempt 485 tomorrow or Sunday.

item.title: 17 (Persistence)
item.description: Bench Day Superset 1 Lift LBs Sets Reps Bench 235 5 3 Barbell Row 235 5 3 Superset 2 Lift LBs Sets Reps Axle Press 190 4 3 Isolation DB Curl 35 4 10

item.title: 16 (Persistence)
item.description: Deadlift Day Yay! Day two back on track. Superset 1 Goal was to deadlift 405 for 5 sets of 3. But failed the third rep of the second set and had to back off a bit. Deadlift: 3 at 405lbs, then 2 at 405lbs. Finished with 3 sets of 3 at 395lbs. Superset with… Ab Roller 5 sets of 10 with bodyweight. Superset 2 Lift LBs Sets Reps SSB Squat 295 4 3 DB Step Up 40 4 6 The program is getting heavy enough that I’m removing some of the supplemental work like the Pinch Block and Jumping Jacks.

item.title: 15 (Persistence)
item.description: Overhead Press Day Getting back into the routine this week. Last week amounted to a full 7 days away from the gym. I was starting to feel a little run down anyway. The weights were feeling heavier than they should. So maybe the week off will do some good for my recovery. Superset 1 Lift LBs Sets Reps Overhead Press 170 5 3 Lat Pulldown 170 5 6 Ran out of time for the second superset.

item.title: 14 (Persistence)
item.description: Bench Day Conflicts in my schedule have caused me to miss a few days this week. I decided to skip ahead to bench day and modify it pretty heavily from what I usually do. Bench: 230lbs 5x3 Barbell Row: 225lbs for 3. Then 245lbs for 2x3 (PR) I am happy with the rowing. For the last several weeks I’ve used an axle bar. With an axle I end up being limited by grip.

item.title: 13 (Persistence)
item.description: Overhead Press Day Superset 1 Lift LBs Sets Reps Overhead Press 165 5 3 Lat Pulldown 165 5 6 Jumping Jacks bw 5 20 Didn’t have time to do the second superset.

item.title: 12 (Persistence)
item.description: Squat Day Superset 1 Lift LBs Sets Reps Squat 345 5 3 Ab Roller bw 5 10 Jumping Jacks bw 5 20 Superset 2 Actually, I didn’t superset. Was feeling so dead at this point that I decided to drop the assistance stuff and only do the 18” deadlifts. Lift LBs Sets Reps 18” Deadlift 415 4 3 415lbs for 3 reps is a PR.

item.title: 11 (Persistence)
item.description: Bench Day Superset 1 Lift LBs Sets Reps Bench 225 5 3 Axle Row 175 5 5 Jumping Jacks bw 5 20 Superset 2 Lift LBs Sets Reps Axle Press 190 4 3 Isolation DB Curl 35 4 10 50’ DB Suitcase Carry 80 4 1

item.title: 10 (Persistence)
item.description: Deadlift Day Superset 1 Lift LBs Sets Reps Deadlift 385 5 3 Ab Roller bw 5 10 Jumping Jacks bw 5 20 These deadlifts felt very heavy. I’m going to watch my protein intake to see if I can continue this block’s linear progression. Though, I might reduce reps down to 2 instead of 3. Or, I might only train deadlifts once every two weeks.

item.title: 9 (Persistence)
item.description: Overhead Press Day Switching it up! Changing up the Persistence program from the first time I ran it. Instead of an upper and lower superset each day, I’m going to have an upper body day with two upper body supersets. Lower body days will have two lower body supersets. This hopefully will be easier to recover from. Superset 1 Lift LBs Sets Reps Overhead Press 160 5 3 Lat Pulldown 166 5 6 Jumping Jacks bw 5 20 Superset 2 Lift LBs Sets Reps DB Floor Fly 35 4 6 Seated DB Press 50 4 8 50’ DB Suitcase Carry 80 4 1

item.title: 8 (Persistence)
item.description: Squat Day Superset 1 Lift LBs Sets Reps Squat 335 5 3 Ab Roller bw 5 8 Jumping Jacks bw 5 20 Superset 2 Lift LBs Sets Reps Axle Press 190 4 3 Pinch Block 47.5 4 3 DB Lunges 35 4 3 I’ve been liking the unilateral work a lot lately.

item.title: 7 (Persistence)
item.description: Bench Day Superset 1 Lift LBs Sets Reps Bench 220 5 3 Axle Rows 160 5 5 Jumping Jacks bw 5 20 Superset 2 Lift Lbs Sets Reps 18” Deadlift 405 4 3 DB Isolation Curl 30 4 10 50’ DB Suitcase Carry 80 4 1 I kept the 18” Deadlifts at 405.

item.title: 6 (Persistence)
item.description: Deadlift Day Superset 1 Lift LBs Sets Reps Deadlift Day 375 5 3 Ab Roller bw 5 8 Jumping Jacks bw 5 20 Deadlifts felt good. I’m really liking the 5x3 scheme. First work set was done without straps for a double overhand PR. Superset 2 Lift Lbs Sets Reps DB Floor Flies 30 4 5 Pinch Block 47.

item.title: 5 (Persistence)
item.description: Overhead Press Day Decided to switch up the set and rep scheme just a little. I’ve been on a calorie deficit for about a week, and I think I’ll be able to keep up with my lifts if I reduce the reps per set, but then increase total sets. Superset 1 Lift Weight Sets Reps Press 155 5 3 Lat Pulldown 155 5 6 Jumping Jacks bw 5 20 Superset 2 Lift Weight Sets Reps SSB Squat 285 4 3 DB Seated Press 50 4 8 50’ DB Suitcase Carry 80 4 1 This new rep/set configuration worked well.

item.title: 4b (Persistence)
item.description: Axle Press Day Superset 1 Lift Weight Sets Reps Axle Press 210 1 2 Axle Press 230 1 1 This workout was just a little make-up day since I had to cut yesterday’s workout short. 210lbs for 2 and 230lbs for 1 are both personal records.

item.title: 4 (Persistence)
item.description: Squat Day Superset 1 Lift Weight Sets Reps Squat 330 3 3 Turkish Get-up 15 3 3 Jumping Jacks bw 3 30 Only had time for one superset today.

item.title: 3 (Persistence)
item.description: Bench Day Superset 1 Lift Weight Sets Reps Bench 215 3 5 Axle Pendlay Row 160 3 8 Jumping Jacks bw 3 30 Superset 2 Lift Weight Sets Reps 18” Deadlift 405 3 3 Isolation DB Curl 30 3 10 50’ DB Suitcase Carry 80 3 2 Today felt really good.

item.title: 2 (Persistence)
item.description: Deadlift Day Superset 1 Lift Weight Sets Reps Deadlift 365 3 5 Ab Roller bw 3 8 Jumping Jacks bw 3 30 Notes: Might adjust this volume on deadlifts. Want to lift heavy, but was really draggin’ after the second round. Superset 2 Lift Weight Sets Reps DB Floor Flies 25 3 5 Pinch Block 45 3 4 One Legged Hip Thrust bw 3 10 Notes: First superset much harder the the second.

item.title: 1 (Persistence)
item.description: Strict Press Day Superset 1 Lift Weight Sets Reps Press 150 3 5 Lat Pulldown 150 2 10 Lat Pulldown 150 1 6 Jumping Jacks bw 3 30 Notes: Reached failure too soon on Lat Pulldown. Keep weight here for next time. Superset 2 Lift Weight Sets Reps SSB Squat 275 2 5 DB Seated Press 40 2 8 50’ Sandbag Carry 165 2 1 Notes: Second superset was interrupted.
